name: Caesar is a gambling addict
description:
Remember to allow your browser to play sounds.

Alea iacta est, the dice is cast. - Julius Caesar

Backstory: Our alternative take on the history of Julius Ceasar is that he might have gambled the whole Empire of Rome away. Take on barbarians in a rythm based, typing, dice match. 

Controls: All keyboard keys.

Goal: Type shown letters to the rhythm. For each completed word you will be given a dice, up to 6. With every win the game gets faster. If you get a word wrong the next phase will start, the game of dice. You roll highier that your opponent, you win. If not, you lose a region of the empire.
